projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A website that is built for a ficitonal international business that sells salmon shaped cookies that contain salmon in them.  This was done using vanilla Javascript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Thw Odd Duck Products app is and app for a fictious company which would allow their customers to vote on their favorite products based upon random sets of three.  They did not want duplicates or the item items showing up back to back in order to mitigate bias in the app.

projects.title: Role Based To-Do List
projects.description: To Do App connected which stores to do items in a 3rd party API, which is connected to other todo Apps. Featuring a settings page that allows the user to hide completed to do items as well as how many to do items are on the page. Login will allow permissions based on role based access controls.

projects.title: Virtual E-Store
projects.description: E-commerce app, connected to the unsplash API for photos, and a 3rd party API for the inventory. Using Redux tool-kit, Material UI as well as the other technoligies listed below.
